page.title: 20JACK ARCHER,HIGHWORTH
page.content: Mr Archer's house and shop are in Station Road.He has lived in Highworth all his life and he was born in 1908 over the road from where he now lives.He has three books to publish and two already done.The published ones are "Highworth and Roundabout"and "The Villages and Highworth".For his other three books to be published it would cost him Â£4000 each but he hasn't got the money yet.The fields that he owns have been in the family since 1919.During the 1939-45 war he worked for the army secretly in connection with Coleshill House.The shop was built in 1976 and sells greengroceries.In his home he has 2000 photos of Highworth and 2000 books of all different things.His interests are the history of Highworth and talking about it.He said that he could go back 3000 years in the history of the town.
